item.title: Deep Learning on MacOS with AMD eGPU?
item.description: I’ve recently sold my Nvidia GTX 1080 eGPU1 after two month’s waiting in vain for a compatible Nvidia video driver for MacOS 10.14 (Mojave). Either Apple’s or Nvidia’s fault, I don’t care any more. Right away, I ordered an AMD Radeon RX Vega 64 on Newegg. The card arrived two days later and it looked sexy at first sight. It’s plug-and-play as expected and performed just as good as its predecessor, regardless of serious gaming, video editing or whatever.
